bullets: • The first legitimately brilliant sharksploitation movie in almost a decade
• Keeper is vintage Oz Perkins, for better and worse
• The predominantly forest-set visuals are stunning, evoking folk horror without belaboring the point
• It’s badly paced with several major lulls where the tension dissipates completely

items.title: What Stranger Things gets right about wormholes
bullets: • Stranger Things gets right about wormholes in the fifth season of the show
• The wormhole concept emerged from Einstein's General Theory of Relativity
• Theoretical physicists still use it to explore scientific questions today
• The story is set in Indiana in a fictional town called Hawkins that gets caught up with a paranormal world

items.title: New Year’s Eve Horror Marathon Schedule
bullets: • This marathon is designed to mirror the emotional arc of New Year’s Eve itself

• The Invitation (2015) slides in seamlessly as the night quiets down
• End of Days leans fully into turn-of-the-century fear, religious horror, and looming catastrophe

items.title: This robot pool cleaner lifts itself out of the water to charge
bullets: • Mammotion, best known for its line of robot lawnmowers, is launching a robot pool cleaner that can take itself out of the water
• The Spino S1 Pro comes with a robotic arm mounted to a docking station that sits at the edge of your pool
• It uses an onboard camera and several sensors to navigate your pool while identifying messy areas, steps, edges, corners, and obstacles

bullets: • Avatar: Fire and Ash is debuting well behind Avatar: The Way of Water, which scooped up $134 million on its opening weekend back in 2022

• A good day on Sunday could see it hit $90 million still
